meanings.definition: A large corporation with operations and subsidiaries in multiple countries.
meanings.sent1: Many multinationals have offices in different countries around the world.
meanings.sent2: The multinationals are expanding their businesses globally to reach more customers.
meanings.sent3: The multinationals decided to have a race around the world to see which office could finish first.
meanings.sent4: The multinationals are like giant puzzle pieces connecting countries together in the business world.
meanings.sent5: The multinationals' presence in various nations is like a colorful map of global commerce.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or involving multiple nations.
meanings.sent1: The multinationals meeting discussed trade agreements between different countries.
meanings.sent2: Her job required a deep understanding of multinationals relations and international policies.
meanings.sent3: The multinationals-themed party had guests representing various countries in their attire.
meanings.sent4: The multinationals collaboration was a beautiful dance of cultures coming together.
meanings.sent5: The multinationals event showcased the diversity and unity of nations working together.
